body_html: Another thing I observed is that the optimization on multi-gpu was working fine for me if I use a built-in loss function, i.e., I did classification using categorical_cross_entropy from keras, and it went smoothly. Could this be a hint of the issue?
body_text: Another thing I observed is that the optimization on multi-gpu was working fine for me if I use a built-in loss function, i.e., I did classification using categorical_cross_entropy from keras, and it went smoothly. Could this be a hint of the issue?
body: Another thing I observed is that the optimization on multi-gpu was working fine for me if I use a built-in loss function, i.e., I did classification using categorical_cross_entropy from keras, and it went smoothly. Could this be a hint of the issue?
